qas.question: Who was the runner up on the third season of American Idol?
What was the name of the first single that Fantasia released after winning American Idol?
What was the first song released by Diana DeGarmo after coming in second on American Idol?
What song did Fantasia sing on the Top 8 show?
Who has said that Barrino's rendition of Summertime has been his top moment of all seasons?
Who were the final two contestants?
Who was declared the season winner?

context: The performance of "<a3_0>Summertime<a3_0/>" by Barrino, later known simply as "<a6_0>Fantasia<a6_0/>", at Top 8 was widely praised, and <a4_0>Simon Cowell<a4_0/> considered it as his favorite Idol moment in the nine seasons he was on the show. <a5_0>Fantasia and <a0_0>Diana DeGarmo<a5_0/><a0_0/> were the last two finalists, and Fantasia was crowned as the winner. Fantasia released as her coronation single "<a1_0><a7_0>I Believe<a7_0/><a1_0/>", a song co-written by season one finalist Tamyra Gray, and DeGarmo released "<a2_0>Dreams<a2_0/>". Fantasia went on to gain some successes as a recording artist, while Hudson, who placed seventh, became the only Idol contestant so far to win both an Academy Award and a Grammy.
